file_content.text: Thanks again for bringing Valhoun's helmet by. That's the best medicine I could ask for.
I hear the 'Pubs are scrambling to cover your handiwork. Wish I could have seen it.
Valhoun's dead, just like the rest of his squad. I thought you should know.
He's really dead? That's the best medicine I could ask for.
I admit, I didn't think it was possible. I'm sorry I ever doubted you.
They were a threat, so I dealt with them accordingly.
I did my duty, nothing more.
I'm sorry I had to ask you to deal with my mess, but Valhoun's death is worth it.
I expected more of a fight.
I'm glad the right person went after him, then. He's been a thorn in the Empire's side for too long.
Sergeant, there's a kolto tank available now.
I'm sorry to cut this short, but it sounds like I need to go. Thank you.
I have erased your failure.
Don't worry. Once I get my arm fixed up, I plan to do just that.
I've taken out Valhoun's commandos. I though you'd want to know.
I wish you could have killed Valhoun, too. That's a shame.
On the other hand, he's not much of a threat without his men.
I figured you'd want the pleasure of killing Valhoun yourself.
I left the leader for you.
I look forward to the chance, soon as I heal up.
I expected more of a fight.
You've done something lots of others have died trying, and with style.
Sergeant, I need you to move to a kolto tank.
I'm afraid I have to cut this short. Just let me say thank you. It means a lot to me.
I cleaned up your failure.
Don't worry, I won't let it happen again.
I'm putting off the kolto tank until you take care of Valhoun and his men. I'd hate to miss the news.
Let me up, you reprogrammed torture droid! I've got news to report.
Your damage is considerable. Please remain still.
Sorry about my outburst, my lord. I didn't expect to see a Sith in medical.
Hey! If you're looking for a contract, I've got a lead.
Sir, I'm sorry, sir. I'd stand to attention, but the 'Pubs filled my legs with shrapnel. Most of my arm, too.
Sorry I haven't had a chance to freshen up. The Republic left me a bit of a mess.
They brought me down here before I could tell anyone--one of the Republic's top special tactics squads is on Taris.
Battlefields are chaotic; you're sure about this?
That's a major claim.
I'd recognize Valhoun's Vultures anywhere. The Empire's been trying to eliminate them for a while.
Lie still. You can report once you're healed.
Your wounds need treating.
With Valhoun's Vultures on Taris, we may not be able to wait that long.
Guess you're in trouble.
Valhoun's Vultures are on Taris. It'll be everyone's mess soon enough.
They're the best fighters the 'Pubs have, you ask me. My squad was following them in the swamp; thought we had them.
Instead, they led us into a minefield. Half of us were down before Valhoun started his attack. We never stood a chance.
I'll see to this threat personally.
They'll be dead very soon.
Be careful, they fight dirty. They took out an entire battalion on Alderaan. No one even saw them until it was too late.
I want everything you know about this squad.
Brief me on their threat.
On Alderaan, they wiped out an entire battalion and blew up our main ammo supply. They sabotaged our shipyards near Elom.
Pathetic.
I see no shame in being afraid. Those 'Pubs wiped out one of our outposts on Balmorra. Nothing left but blaster marks and corpses.
I'm in no position to make a request of you, but the Empire needs someone to take them out.
Killing them secures our resources and hits the Republic right in the gut. Say you'll go after them. Please.
These Vultures will soon meet their namesake.
I'll take care of them.
They will be powerless before the might of the Force.
I'll take care of them.
I'll bill Command after the job's done.
I'll take care of them.
These Vultures are about to meet a real predator.
I'll take care of them.
They're dead hard, and they fight dirty--but I expect you do, too.
How do I find them?
We found them out by the ruined swoop tracks. I'll bet there's a camp near there.
Oh, I'd love to see Valhoun himself dead if you get the chance... good hunting!
Not my problem. [Refuse quest]
Then I'll go after them myself as soon as I'm healed. Enjoy the rest of your visit.
Filthy droid. Try being careful for a change.
Sorry, sir.
